name: Baldur's Gate Pale
description: A brew from the Cutlass in Luskan.

name: Baldur's Gate Red Ale
description: A red ale sold at Port Llast.

name: Belbuck
description: A transulent green, spearmint beer favored by halflings.

name: Bitter Black
description: This heavy beer tastes best when served at cellar temperatures. Arabellans look down upon anyone drinking it at a different temperature. Bitter Black has a dark black color with a thick head of deep brown foam.

name: Black Bottom
description: An ale with a rough-edged, smoky taste.

name: Dragon's Breath Beer
description: This beer has a strong and harsh flavor. It is best served with dark rye bread and death cheese.

name: Elminster's Choice
description: This dark beer has a thick head and was clouded with yeast. It has a smokey aftertaste.

name: Golden Sands Basic
description: The purest form of the Golden Sands lagers, this brew did not contain any additional flavorings. It has a light yellow coloration.

name: Golden Sands Gold
description: This lager contains flavor from select cacti and nettles, adding a distinctly sharp taste to the drink. It has a deep golden color.

name: Golden Sands Orange
description: Orange and currant are used to flavor this lager, giving it a slightly acidic aftertaste. This lager is the sweetest of the Golden Sands brews.
